特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: None but it is expected that the student is not a complete beginner to be in this course and although there will be review and fluency work with easier English, the student should be familiar with the English a typical Japanese student learns in Junior high school and Senior high school.
授業の概要・背景: This course is designed to help mid-level students gain greater exposure to the TOEIC exam as well as gain a grasp of the subtle nuances of the test. By the end of the course, students should feel confident taking the exam due to their extensive exposure to all its various components. This course meets once a week.
授業方法:
For AY 2022/2023 the plan is to teach face-to-face in the classroom with precautions to prevent the spread of covid. However, if the covid situation worsens there is a possibility that classes may be moved to partially or wholly online. The teacher will update you at that time in detail if that happens but in general classes would use Zoom, Luna, and other online tools.

Students will learn in a variety of modes. These modes will include individual work but collaborative learning in pairs and small groups will be the most common mode of study but traditional test preparation methods will also be used.
